        <before>false</before>

        <name>MSSCUSTODY-2530 new logic</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[  var grTrade = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_mss_c_proc_mss_custody_trade');
  grTrade.get('2732c9b11bf84690ff37eb14b24bcb78');
  gs.info(grTrade.number);


  var owningBusiness = grTrade.owning_business;
  var trdType = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group_type');
  trdType.get(owningBusiness);
  var typeID = trdType.sys_id;
  gs.info('typeID:' + typeID);

  var logUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
  if (logUser.get('023ff1be1b26cad46ed00e1ad34bcb77'));
  var usrBand = logUser.u_user_band;

  gs.info('user band:' + usrBand);


  var grGroup = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
  grGroup.addEncodedQuery('u_associated_group_band=' + usrBand + '^typeLIKE' + typeID); //Considering only access groups
  grGroup.query();
  if (grGroup.next()) {
      gs.info('settlement amount =' + grTrade.settlement_amount_in_usd);
      gs.info('Group ' + grGroup.name);
      gs.info('Group Limit in USD = ' + grGroup.u_usd_limit);

  }]]></script>
